file.name: security_sample.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
- url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v2
info:
  description: 'This example defines different security schemes.'
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore New
  termsOfService: http://swagger.io/terms/
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
tags:
- name: pet
x-wso2-basePath: /petstore/v1
x-wso2-production-endpoints:
  urls:
  - https://petstore.swagger.io/v2
security:
 - ApiKeyAuthQuery: []                    # applies API key security in API level
paths:
  "/pet/{petId}":
    get:
      tags:
      - pet
      summary: Find pet by ID
      operationId: getPetById
      parameters:
      - name: petId
        in: path
        description: ID of pet to return
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      security:
        - OAuth2:
           - read
           - write
        - ApiKeyAuth: []             # adds API key security to the resource
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        '400':
          description: Invalid ID supplied
        '404':
          description: Pet not found
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      required:
      - name
      - photoUrls
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        category:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        photoUrls:
          type: string
          items:
            type: string
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
          - available
          - sold
      xml:
        name: Pet
  securitySchemes:
    OAuth2:                          # defines OAuth2 security scheme
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        authorizationCode:
          authorizationUrl: https://example.com/oauth/authorize
          tokenUrl: https://example.com/oauth/token
          scopes:                    # scopes relevant to the OAuth2 security scheme
            read: Grants read access
            write: Grants write access
            admin: Grants access to admin operations
    ApiKeyAuth:                      # arbitrary name for the API key security scheme
      type: apiKey
      in: header                     # allows using defined ApiKeyAuth as a header value
      name: X-API-KEY                # name to provide API as a header value
    ApiKeyAuthQuery:                 # arbitrary name for the API key security scheme
      type: apiKey
      in: query                      # allows using defined ApiKeyAuthQuery as a query parameter
      name: X-API-KEY-Q              # name to provide API key as a query parameter
  requestBodies:
    Pet:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        application/xml:
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Pet"
      description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
      required: true

Error: security: failed to write file oas_security_gen.go: format: 103:3: expected 1 expression
